attributes.action: Lower the age for cervical smear test to 16 or 18
attributes.additional_details:
There are ladies dying or contracting cancer because they are not aloud to have a smear. ‘They are too young’ 
Cancer does not discriminate because of age so why should the NHS.
attributes.background:
Hello, my name is Joanne and I want to start this petition as 5 years ago I went for my smear and had cell changes. I had treatment and these were removed. 
When I was talking about this it amazed me that some people wanted to go but they were too young.
